name: The Brotherhood
description: The Brotherhood by Animas Seed Co. is a stimulating cross of Slick Willie and Icarus. This strain has a quick onset and robust longevity, making it ideal for anyone seeking some get-up-and-go. Hitting firmly between the eyes and rippling outward throughout the body, The Brotherhood offers a stimulating alertness ideal for exercise, sports, or outdoor activity. Do not indulge in this particular strain near or before bed as the stimulating effects can easily postpone rest.
descriptionPlain: The Brotherhood by Animas Seed Co. is a stimulating cross of Slick Willie and Icarus. This strain has a quick onset and robust longevity, making it ideal for anyone seeking some get-up-and-go. Hitting firmly between the eyes and rippling outward throughout the body, The Brotherhood offers a stimulating alertness ideal for exercise, sports, or outdoor activity. Do not indulge in this particular strain near or before bed as the stimulating effects can easily postpone rest.

highlightedReviews.text: Picked this up from Mindful in Berthoud, CO. The high brought on some munchies and a lot of euphoric feelings. It was a creeping kind of high - started mellow and ramped up. Felt alert and no couch lock, but was a little distracted. Enjoyed this one a lot and would have it again.

So I came across this strain on my travels in Colorado...taste great. Earthy to me. Got me focused and enjoying the day. Felt happy and buzzed but not to the point where I could not function. Iâ€™m a heavy hitter so take it lightly if ur new or just a light weight. Gave the munchies...
